title: Learn more about the EAA
body:
What We Do
We help to raise funds and awareness to to different topics concerning education and the educational system in America. We give our support to local groups, school boards and private persons that want to get involved.
Mission, Vision, Goals 
Our efforts to be an important advocate for education in America, Through our work in the legislative, legal and public arenas we want to influence the politic as well as the public attitude towards education. We believe education is a civil right, and public education is America’s most vital institution.
Why we created this community 
We think that communication and the sharing of knowledge is one of the key stones to improve our educational system. We think that through connecting professionals all over the country we can help to start a discussion about what is important in education, about new teaching methods and help local communities to learn from others.
Contact Us
Find out contact information. You can reach us by phone, fax, email, and after-hours cell phone number for members of the media.

title: Discussion about the next event
body: We need to decide what will be the next event what we want to organize. I would propose that everybody who has an idea will post those in the comments. then we can decide which one seems the most promising.
comment_text: I think we should do some event to create more attention for this community to draw more people of our community to this platform. I have no idea what it could be, though.

title: What was your most successful initiative?
body:
Hi guys,
I just started working in the board of schools in my town. So I saw this group here and I thought it would be a good idea to open a thread where we could exchange our most finest hours ;-). I am especially interested in successful fund raising campaigns you guys ran, but of course any input is appreciated

title: Donating books to the school library
body:
Dear community,
over the last month we gathered books that we could acquire or were donated to us, to improve the school library. I am happy to announce, that his weekend we will hand them over to the school. We hope to have a small impact on our community and will further try to keep up the work. Thanks to all who helped to make this happen!
Best Wishes
Robert Andrews

title: First National EAA Conference
body: Finally it is happening. The first official conference for EAA members. This is a Unique chance to meet other professionals, learn about the newest topics and listen to interesting talks. Sign up know and reserve your ticket
comment_text: Everybody ready for the big event?

title: Charity Run Springfield
body: Take part in the 3. annual Springfield Charity Run! This year we raise money to support the less fortunate students of our district. All incomes of the event will go into a fund supporting tuition fees books and other expenses for students who need support to fulfil their dreams.

comment_text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Habes, inquam, Cato, formam eorum, de quibus loquor, philosophorum. Theophrasti igitur, inquit, tibi liber ille placet de beata vita? Iam doloris medicamenta illa Epicurea tamquam de narthecio proment: Si gravis, brevis; Quod autem in homine praestantissimum atque optimum est, id deseruit.
